targets.expr: count(count by (session_id) (claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project", agent=~"$agent", session_id=~"$session_id"}))
sum(sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cost_usd [$__range]))
sum(sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap input_tokens [$__range]))
sum(sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap output_tokens [$__range]))
sum(sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cache_read_tokens [$__range]))
sum(sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cache_creation_tokens [$__range]))
sum(increase(claude_code_lines_of_code_count_total{project=~"$project", agent=~"$agent", session_id=~"$session_id"}[$__range]))
sum(increase(claude_code_active_time_seconds_total{project=~"$project", agent=~"$agent", session_id=~"$session_id"}[$__range]))

sum by (pa) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | label_format pa=`{{.project}}/{{.agent}}` | unwrap cost_usd [$__range]))

sum by (pa) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | label_format pa=`{{.project}}/{{.agent}}` | unwrap input_tokens [$__range])) + sum by (pa) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | label_format pa=`{{.project}}/{{.agent}}` | unwrap output_tokens [$__range])) + sum by (pa) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | label_format pa=`{{.project}}/{{.agent}}` | unwrap cache_read_tokens [$__range])) + sum by (pa) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | label_format pa=`{{.project}}/{{.agent}}` | unwrap cache_creation_tokens [$__range]))
sum by (project, agent) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cost_usd [$__range]))

sum by (project, agent) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap input_tokens [$__range])) + sum by (project, agent) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap output_tokens [$__range])) + sum by (project, agent) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cache_read_tokens [$__range])) + sum by (project, agent) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cache_creation_tokens [$__range]))
count by (project, agent) (count by (project, agent, session_id) (claude_code_token_usage_tokens_total{project=~"$project", agent=~"$agent", session_id=~"$session_id"}))
sum by (model) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cost_usd [$__auto]))
sum(sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap input_tokens [$__auto]))
sum(sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap output_tokens [$__auto]))
sum(sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cache_read_tokens [$__auto]))
sum(sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cache_creation_tokens [$__auto]))
sum(increase(claude_code_lines_of_code_count_total{project=~"$project", agent=~"$agent", session_id=~"$session_id"}[$__rate_interval]))

label_replace(sum by (agent) (max by (agent, session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_commit_count_total{project=~"$project", agent=~"$agent", session_id=~"$session_id"}[$__range]))), "type", "Commits", "", "") or label_replace(sum by (agent) (max by (agent, session_id) (max_over_time(claude_code_pull_request_count_total{project=~"$project", agent=~"$agent", session_id=~"$session_id"}[$__range]))), "type", "PRs", "", "")

sum by (tool, result) (count_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `tool_result` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | label_format tool=`{{ if eq .tool_name "mcp_tool" }}mcp:{{ regexReplaceAll ".*mcp_tool_name\":\"([^\"]*)\".*" .tool_parameters "${1}" }}{{ else }}{{ .tool_name }}{{ end }}`, result=`{{ if eq .success "true" }}ok{{ else }}fail{{ end }}` [$__auto]))
sum(count_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `tool_result` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | success=`false` [$__range]))

sum(count_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `tool_result` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | success=`false` [$__range])) / sum(count_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `tool_result` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` [$__range])) * 100

sum by (agent, tool, error) (count_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `tool_result` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | success=`false` | label_format tool=`{{ if eq .tool_name "mcp_tool" }}mcp:{{ regexReplaceAll ".*mcp_tool_name\":\"([^\"]*)\".*" .tool_parameters "${1}" }}{{ else }}{{ .tool_name }}{{ end }}` [$__range]))

sum by (agent, tool) (count_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `tool_result` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | label_format tool=`{{ if eq .tool_name "mcp_tool" }}mcp:{{ regexReplaceAll ".*mcp_tool_name\":\"([^\"]*)\".*" .tool_parameters "${1}" }}{{ else }}{{ .tool_name }}{{ end }}` [$__range]))

sum by (agent, tool) (count_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `tool_result` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | success=`false` | label_format tool=`{{ if eq .tool_name "mcp_tool" }}mcp:{{ regexReplaceAll ".*mcp_tool_name\":\"([^\"]*)\".*" .tool_parameters "${1}" }}{{ else }}{{ .tool_name }}{{ end }}` [$__range]))

avg by (agent, tool) (avg_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `tool_result` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | label_format tool=`{{ if eq .tool_name "mcp_tool" }}mcp:{{ regexReplaceAll ".*mcp_tool_name\":\"([^\"]*)\".*" .tool_parameters "${1}" }}{{ else }}{{ .tool_name }}{{ end }}` | unwrap duration_ms [$__range]))
sum by (session_id, project, agent) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cost_usd [$__range]))

sum by (session_id, project, agent) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap input_tokens [$__range])) + sum by (session_id, project, agent) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap output_tokens [$__range])) + sum by (session_id, project, agent) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cache_read_tokens [$__range])) + sum by (session_id, project, agent) (sum_over_time({service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | session_id=~`$session_id` | unwrap cache_creation_tokens [$__range]))
sum by (session_id, project, agent) (increase(claude_code_lines_of_code_count_total{project=~"$project", agent=~"$agent", session_id=~"$session_id"}[$__range]))
sum by (session_id, project, agent) (increase(claude_code_active_time_seconds_total{project=~"$project", agent=~"$agent", session_id=~"$session_id"}[$__range]))

{service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_request` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | line_format `{{.project}}.{{.agent}} | model={{.model}} cost=$${{.cost_usd}} tokens_in={{.input_tokens}} tokens_out={{.output_tokens}} cache_read={{.cache_read_tokens}} duration={{.duration_ms}}ms`

{service_name="claude-code"} |= `tool_result` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | line_format `{{.project}}.{{.agent}} | {{.tool_name}} decision={{.decision_type}} source={{.decision_source}} success={{.success}} duration={{.duration_ms}}ms size={{.tool_result_size_bytes}}b{{if .error}} error="{{.error}}"{{end}}`

{service_name="claude-code"} |= `api_error` | project=~`$project` | agent=~`$agent` | line_format `{{.project}}.{{.agent}} | model={{.model}} error={{.error}} status={{.status_code}} duration={{.duration_ms}}ms attempt={{.attempt}}`
